Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエンか……なんかすごくキレイな街だって ウワサは聞いた事があるな。
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen, huh... I've heard that it's a very beautiful town.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……とても裕福で、平穏な街だ。 だが表向き華やかでも裏では……という事もある。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... The town is affluent and tranquil. Though they say that shady things happen behind that flowery exterior.

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエンは、そうなのか？
Entry.EnglishText: So that's what Kyogen is like?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……物事には二面性がある、 という話だ……
Entry.EnglishText: Well... It's said that there are two sides to everything...
